Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.Tile
  • public class Tile
extends Object
    A terrain tile that controls movement and visibility cost.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Tile​(String id, String name, int movementCost, int visibilityCost)
      Construct a tile, this should never be used, it is here for sole use by the TileFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getId()
      Get the ID of the terrain tile.
      int getMovementCost()
      Get cost to move into the tile.
      String getName()
      Get name of tile.
      int getVisibilityCost()
      Get cost to attack modifier if shooting through or into the tile.
      String toString()
      Get string representation of terrain tile.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        Tile​(String id,
     String name,
     int movementCost,
     int visibilityCost)
        Construct a tile, this should never be used, it is here for sole use by the TileFactory.
        Parameters:
        id - terrain ID
        name - name of tile
        movementCost - movement point cost to traverse tile
        visibilityCost - attack/visibility modifier
